  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<ProtocolHandler>, Collection<ProtocolHandler>, List<ProtocolHandler>, ProtocolHandlerChain

    public class LMTPProtocolHandlerChain
extends SMTPProtocolHandlerChain
    Special SMTPProtocolHandlerChain sub-class which should be used to build the chain for LMTP.
